docs.abstract: Voters across the United States will choose candidates for 435 seats in the House and nearly three dozen in the Senate. Thirty-six states will elect governors.

docs.lead_paragraph: Good Tuesday morning, and happy Election Day. Here are some of the stories making news in Washington and politics today.

headline.main: On Politics: Election Day Is Here

docs.abstract: Candidates across the nation delivered their closing arguments over the weekend ahead of Tuesday’s midterm elections.

docs.abstract: The Massachusetts senator is forming a presidential exploratory committee, making her the first major candidate in what is likely to be a crowded Democratic primary.
